name: HM Martinique

reviews.text: Oh Baby did we have a ball : ) Got off the coach at night and was pleased with the hotel , it was all lit up and looked bigger and better than expected. Went for a look around and found a lap dancing club within five mins, so what can a boy do ? It was called " Heaven " very apt.
reviews.title: This is the Real Thing

reviews.text: Next morning we found the beach, loads of beds , not too much wonga, and the views were class :) We went all out on a day trip after going to the BCM club it was tops, they do boat parties on Saturdays, loads of sexy girls topping up tans, who needs the clubs ? live djs and a real good vibe, just everyone having a good time. One word of warning, dont forget the suntan lotion got some nasty sunburn, I know, I can hear me ma telling me not to forget, so I,m telling you, dont forget, it hurts :(
reviews.title: Summer starts here !!

reviews.title: Home from Home

reviews.text: I,m only young so this literally was my dream holiday place.
reviews.title: We had A Ball

reviews.text: Arrived late so we threw our stuff into our rooms and went looking for a club. Didn,t have to look far, they are everywhere, bring it on. The streets at night are full of partying people it was so exiting, yeah loving it.
reviews.title: Top place to be

reviews.text: Just got back from a brilliant holiday at The Martinique. Went with 2 friends and we had the best time. beach is 5 min walk away and this must be the party capital of the world, and I have been everywhere ! The rooms were really nice and much better than we were expecting. Loved the pool too with the crazy entertainer! Would go back especially in the summer when there are more people around.
reviews.title: Brilliant holiday!

reviews.text: The weather was fantastic and hot and sunny everyday but at the night it was a bit colder. Shuttle buses are a waste of time and it took us 2 hours to get to the hotel because the driver had to stop at 10 places before dropping us!
reviews.title: one member of staff can spoil it
Convenient location
reviews.text: What a shame it ended so quick, just as I was getting used to it!!!!

Stayed at the HM Martinique 01/4/11 to 05/4/11 on my sons stag do. We had a fantastic time. There were 22 blokes of a varied age group. youngest 23 oldest 70. I dont care about other reviews that condem meals etc. These people need a reality check. The cost of all inclusive is almost unbelievable. You can hardly stay in a hostel in the UK for this price. This hotel is superb for the money. Just read that someone got robbed while we were there, but stayed in 4* hotels in the past and heard the same. Everything was great, all but one member of staff that tried to rule with an iron fist. The bar is suposed to be open till 23.00 and my mate, a 70 year old guy, was stopped at 3 minutes to 11 from getting another half of beer. Then on our last night I got to the front of the cue got served half a beer and asked the bar-tender to get my cousin a half who was stood a yard away. The guy in question came up to him snatched the beer out of his hands, spilled some over him and shouted no. I complained at reception and the guy followed me. When he talked to me, he started rabbiting on about how us English come over with all our money thinking we own the place. Watch out because in my opinion he will cause some major problem one day. You will know him when you see how he operates. Other than that it was a superb trip and would recommend this hotel for all stag and hen do's.
reviews.title: A Blinder of a Week

reviews.text: Just came back from a 3 nights stay with my husband and the hotel was absolutly fine for what we needed although it was nothing luxurious. I think that the location was very handy because it is close to many aminities Magalluf has to offer. Prices of drinks are a bit steep but we didn´t spend too much time in the hotel. There are many restaurants in the area that offer lunch for only 10 Euros and not bad at all.
reviews.title: Perfect place for all ages

reviews.text: Just returned from 3 nights Hen Holiday at this Hotel, we stayed All Ainclusive. Our age range was between 19-45 and the party size was 16.
reviews.title: Perfect Hen/Stag Party Hotel

reviews.text: Rooms are really nice much better than expected, tho our shower was only a trickle & water was freezing cold. The walls are very thin & you can here whats going on in next room but in our case that was fine as our neighbours were with us.
reviews.title: No go if you have kids!!

reviews.text: Food was the let down for us & tho we ate breakfast (greasy sausage in a roll) & managed some kind of dinner (chip roll) we ate our meal out in a evening as really couldn't face it.
reviews.title: RIDICULOUS RULES IN HOTEL

reviews.text: Pool area was really nice, loads of space & plenty sunbeds. Pool opened at 10am & you needed to arrive bang on 2 get the good spots if in a large group. The pool itself was large & well maintained but frezzing cold which i expected for April. The pool bar opened 11am serving larger & spirits but if you needed water you had 2 go in2 hotel bar!
reviews.title: Never again!!!!

reviews.text: Booze was ok, i stuck 2 the san migel on draft which was strong as can't drink cheap vodka ect. What really made us all mad was all the queing up for drinks & only 1 drink at a time per person. It took us 30mins on a evening 2 get a half san migel so as soon as you got served you just had 2 join the back of the que & by the time you got 2 front you were ready for another.
reviews.title: Stag and Hen Paradise

reviews.text: Me and me best mate had a crack at this holiday heaven. We came in the middle of the summer, so everything was busy and I,ve never seen so many bodies in one place, the beach was amazing, for a young lad like me it was a dream come true. Best bits were :-

description: HM Martinique is a popular All Inclusive aparthotel in the vibrant resort of Magaluf. Situated in an excellent location just minutes from the fabulous Magaluf beach and very close to all the exciting attractions that Magalluf has to offer! An ideal choice for an unforgettable holiday in Mallorca. At the hotel HM Martinique, we offer a wide range of services and activities which means that you can spend the day by the pool, swimming, sunbathing and taking part in as little or as many of the activities as you wish, and when you get thirsty why not enjoy a cool drink from our pool bar.
